document_data.caption: A map showing Rogarsheim in Norland.
document_data.name: Rogarsheim
document_data.mainbody: '''Rogarsheim''' was the [[Northlander]] capital on the island of [[Norland]] in the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles|10}}
document_data.Geography: The city was located on the [[Bay of Norland]] along the coast of the [[Sea of Moonshae]] near the center of the island.{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Inhabitants: Jarl [[Rault|Rault "the Wise"]] ruled Norland from [[Stormbanner Hold]] in Rogarsheim in the {{YearlinkName|1479}}. The population of Rogarsheim was a mix of Northlanders and [[Ffolk]]. There were plenty of [[dwarves]] here as well who were eager to mine the [[North Jotunhammer Mountains|north]] and [[South Jotunhammer Mountains]]. It was also not uncommon to see [[fey]] creatures from [[Gwynneth]] who came to Rogarsheim to trade.
document_data.Activties: Most of Rogarsheim's industry was centered around fishing, hunting, and shipbuilding.
